--- schema
type MapAsStringpairs map {
  String: String
} representation stringpairs {
	innerDelim "="
	entryDelim ","
}
--- expected
{
  "MapAsStringpairs": {
    "kind": "map",
    "keyType": "String",
    "valueType": "String",
    "representation": {
      "stringpairs": {
        "innerDelim": "=",
        "entryDelim": ","
      }
    }
  }
}
---
